content: What software development processes and additional trainings did all the teams apply and undergo throughout the project?

According to the document, all teams applied full software development processes based on what they learned in the advanced course. Additionally, they were trained in the following areas:

* Communication skills
* Risk management
* Technical writing
* Effective presentation methods
